items.title: Score Lacoste deals with up to 50% off underwear, polos, tees, socks, and more
items.summary:
Amazon is offering some great deals on classy Lacoste pieces, including a standout selection of the classic Lacoste polo. It comes in a variety of colors from basics like black, white, and navy to pastel yellow and blue, and a good range of sizes is on sale for up to 50% off.

This polo is the tried-and-true classic most of us think of when we hear “Lacoste.” It’s timeless, effortless, and classy all at once. Part of Lacoste’s Sport collection, it provides comfort and functionality on the court while easily transitioning into an everyday wardrobe staple. Made with rip-resistant fabric, its durability and timeless look will keep it in your rotation for years to come. Grab your size on sale now while quantities last.
Shop the entire sale here.

A US appeals court upholds a contempt ruling in Epic v. Apple but says Apple can charge commissions on external links, with the rate to be set by a lower court  —  Apple Inc. lost its challenge to a judge's rebuke for disobedience but won a new chance to argue for charging developers …

A new branch of Autel’s devices, these models have spent the time since their release in August through October keeping to their $299 and $399 price tags, which we’ve been seeing steadily ramping up discounts since early Black Friday sales. First they received cuts to $249 and $299, with the 2-cam pack then going lower to $199, while the 4-cam dropped to $254. Today’s deal brings larger-than-ever $143 and $200 markdowns off their full tag rates, landing them at new all-time low prices just in time to score them ahead of Christmas.

items.title: Ford and SK On are ending their US battery joint venture
items.summary: The factories live on; the joint venture will not. The two companies will divide the assets: Ford will take ownership and operation of the twin battery plants in Kentucky, while SK On will operate the factory at the massive BlueOval SK campus in Tennessee.
